name: Sri Ram Engineering & Fabrication Works
overview: SRI RAM ENGINEERING & FABRICATION WORKS started its functioning in the year 1990 at Hyderabad, Andhra Pradesh in India. Since our establishment, we have emerged as one of the prominent names in the market involved in manufacturing and supplying comprehensive array of highly reliable Rotary Dryers, Reactors and Chemical Equipment. Under the support and efficient guidance of Mr. K. Ramulu, our Proprietor, we have established ourselves well in the market. Owing to his farsightedness and shrewdness, we have extend our products keeping in mind the needs and demands of our clients. Our product range includes Extractors, Rotary Dryers, Industrial Receivers, Reactors, Reboilers, Industrial Heat Exchangers, Nutsche Filters, Lee Filters and Rotary Vacuum Dryers.
